@graph.name: Meighan Brodkey
@graph.description: Salesforce MVP, Slack pusher, learning fanatic, detail obsessed, WIT User Group leader, Technical Architect, ❤️ challenges. Former Girl Scout, current rockstar.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Submit Salesforce Events
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: If you know of any Salesforce Events that are happening, please fill out this Google Form with the information. Or if you have any information on the events that are missing info, please fill out the Event Form below as well.

jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Schedule an appointment to chat with me.

jetpack-related-posts.title: It Simply Works Until It Doesn’t Tahoe Dreamin 18
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: It Simply Works... Until it Doesn't At Tahoe Dreamin’ 2018, Daniel Stange and I, Meighan Brodkey, presented on the Admin track.  Salesforce empowers non-programmers to become App Builders and declarative developers in ways that administrators could only dream of before Visual Workflow and Process Builder had been introduced. Consequently, with…

img.alt_text: It Simply Works Until It Breaks

jetpack-related-posts.title: How Flow Can Help You Become a Developer
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Using Flow to Become a Developer North Africa DreaminOctober 19, 2019 <!-- --> North Africa Dreamin Why Participate? During this event, developers, administrators, business users and Salesforce partners will gather to train and share their knowledge and expertise.
